code: import React from'react';import'./Facility.css';import{FaHome}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Facility=()=>{const features=[{title:'Wheelchair Accessible',description:'Fully accessible with ramps, wide walkways, and barrier-free design throughout.'},{title:'Five Spacious Bedrooms',description:'Comfortable, private bedrooms designed for rest and personal space.'},{title:'Main-Floor Accessibility',description:'Main-floor bedroom and bathroom with roll-in shower for enhanced accessibility.'},{title:'Quiet Cul-de-Sac Location',description:'Peaceful neighborhood setting in South St. Paul, away from busy streets.'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"facility",className:"facility bg-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Our Beautiful Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-line"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"A three-story home designed with comfort, accessibility, and dignity in mind"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"facility-content grid grid-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"facility-features",children:features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:feature.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:feature.description})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"facility-image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/house.png",alt:"Beautiful three-story Sayid Care home exterior",className:"house-image",onError:e=>{e.target.style.display='none';e.target.nextSibling.style.display='flex';}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"house-icon-container",style:{display:'none'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHome,{className:"house-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Beautiful three-story home"})]})]})]})]})});};export default Facility;
